coreAttributes.name: heavy cannon
coreAttributes.description: A fully automatic weapon made by the UAC.
coreAttributes.attackTooltipDescription: Shoot at [npc2.name] with the heavy cannon.

hitDescriptions.hitText: Pulling on the trigger, [npc.name] [npc.verb(fire)] a rounds of energy at [npc2.name].
Opening fire, [npc2.name] is targeted by the shot!
Aiming at [npc2.name], [npc.name] [npc.verb(open)] fire and [npc.verb(let)] the heavy cannon shot impacts with [npc2.name]!

missDescriptions.missText: Pulling on the trigger, [npc.name] [npc.verb(fire)] a rounds of energy at [npc2.name], but [npc2.name] saw it coming and managed to avoid the rounds.
Opening fire, [npc2.name] is on the path of the shot! [npc2.name] managed to stay out of [npc.namePos] line of sight.
Aiming at [npc2.name], [npc.name] [npc.verb(open)] fire and [npc.verb(let)] the shot go past [npc2.name]!
